Job Title: Billing Specialist - Summer '24

Location: Littleton, CO

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Accounting/Auditing, Finance

Description:
What We Are Looking For

3D Systems – Personalized Surgery & Medical Devices seeks a candidate who is a dependable, professional individual who excels under pressure and can easily multi-task. This position offers seasonal temporary employment for a 3 to 4-month period, starting in May 2024 and ending the beginning of August 2024, with a possible transition to a regular role.

Only local candidates will be considered.

What You Will Do

 Maintain high-level, continuous professional correspondence with world-wide surgeons, staff, distributors for coordination of billing, shipping time frames, addresses, and deliverables  Manage daily shipping queue  Engage in regular customer satisfaction conversations  Creating shipping paperwork for outgoing cases  Accurately inputting cases into the accounting database  Request purchase orders  Ship confirming cases for invoice generation  Review open orders and incoming purchase orders for accuracy and discrepancies  Input incoming purchase orders accurately into accounting system  Create quotes for custom pricing cases  Create credit memos  Review open accounts weekly and close any outstanding sales orders  Coordination and execution with internal and external teams for same day shipments  Work closely with accounting department to ensure that accounts are in good standing  Track outgoing shipments to ensure any shipping delays are resolved in a timely manner  High level of product knowledge  Adhere to ISO 13485, HIPAA Regulations, and the Quality Management System’s standard operating procedures and work instructions  Assists in answering phones and transferring calls to appropriate personnel 

What You Will Bring

 Previous work experience in billing or accounting desired but not required  High School Diploma or equivalent work experience  As a manufacturer with aerospace and defense customers under ITAR, candidate must be a U.S. person  Ability to sit for extended periods of time 

The Good Stuff!

 Hourly Range: $19.00 - $22.00/Hr. (Salary to be determined by the education, experience, knowledge, skills, and abilities of the candidate, and alignment with market data)  As a temporary position, this role is not eligible for benefits. 

 Applications will be accepted online through May 2, 2024 

3D Systems is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to, among other things, race, color, ethnicity, religion, sex, age, sexual orientation, genetic information, marital status, gender identity or national origin or because he or she is an individual with a disability or a disable veteran, Armed Forces service medal veteran (referred to collectively as "protected veterans"). The Company also provides applicants with equal employment opportunities without regard to pregnancy, childbirth, medical needs arising from pregnancy or childbirth, and related medical conditions including, but not limited to, lactation.
